name: @emazzotta/lighthouse-badges
description: ðŸš¦Generate gh-badges (shields.io) based on Lighthouse performance.

scripts.app:reinstall: bun run app:uninstall && bun run app:install
scripts.build: bun run build:prepare && bun run build:compile && bun run build:copy-declarations
scripts.build:prepare: bun run clean && mkdir -p dist && sed 's#"dist/src/index.js"#"src/index.js"#' package.json > ./dist/package.json && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE.md dist
scripts.ci:publish: bun run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.docker:build: bun run build && docker build --build-arg VCS_REF=`git rev-parse --short HEAD` --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"` --build-arg VERSION=latest -t emazzotta/lighthouse-badges .
scripts.docker:system-test:run: docker run emazzotta/lighthouse-badges /bin/sh -c 'lighthouse-badges -rsu https://google.com && cd /home/lighthouse && EXEC_PATH=/home/chrome/reports bun run system-test:verify'
scripts.pre-push: bun run lint:fix && bun run test:all
scripts.start: bun run build && bun run run:local
scripts.system-test:full-run: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run app:reinstall && bun run run:global && bun run system-test:verify
scripts.system-test:light-run: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run run:local && bun run system-test:verify
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run system-test:full-run
scripts.upgrade: bunx npm-check-updates -i && bun install && bun update && bun run pre-push

author: Emanuele Mazzotta
